service.name: checkContentPermission
service.description: Check for permission to perform operation on Content

service.name: checkAssocPermission
service.description: Check for permission to perform operation on Content

service.name: assocContent
service.description: Check for permission to perform operation on Content

service.name: createDataResourceAndText
service.description: Create a DataResource and, possibly, ElectronicText or ImageDataResource

service.name: updateDataResourceAndText
service.description: Create a DataResource and, possibly, ElectronicText or ImageDataResource

service.name: getElectronicText
service.description: Get a ElectronicText: Can pass either content value object or contentId

service.name: createSurveyResponse
service.description: Create a Survey Response w/ Response Answers

service.name: surveyResponseProcessInterface
service.description: Interface for Survey Response Processing services defined on the Survey

service.name: createContentAndAssoc
service.description: Create a Content, DataResource and/or ContentAssoc

service.name: traverseContent
service.description: Follow a content and return descendants

service.name: getSubContent
service.description: Get subContent of passed contentId/mapKey or subContentId

service.name: persistContentAndAssoc
service.description: Create a Content, DataResource and/or ContentAssoc

service.name: deactivateAssocs
service.description: Supply thruDate to all ContentAssoc that come "before" current one
